seller_description: The Roborock Q5 Max+ Robot Vacuum redefines home cleaning with advanced technology and convenience. Designed to support 2.4G WiFi, it ensures seamless connectivity and optimal performance. Equipped with a self-emptying Auto-Empty Dock, it features two 2.5L dust bags that allow up to 7 weeks of hands-free cleaning, reducing manual trash disposal and keeping your home environment cleaner. With 5500 Pa HyperForce suction and an advanced DuoRoller Brush, it effortlessly captures dust, dirt, pet hair, and debris from various flooring types while minimizing tangles. The PreciSense LiDAR Navigation System creates detailed 3D maps, enabling quick and accurate multi-level mapping for efficient cleaning. Its 770ml dustbin capacity, ability to clean up to 3,767 sqft, and a 240-minute runtime on a single charge make it perfect for large households. Voice and app control compatibility with Alexa, Siri, and Google Home add unparalleled convenience. The package includes the Q5 Max+ Robot Vacuum, Auto-Empty Dock, power cable, two dust bags, a dustbin, a side brush, and a user manual for effortless setup and operation.
review: The loading dock is under a tray at the very bottom of the box. I almost tossed it out. Don’t make the same mistake. I was having issues getting Max to dock and while searching reviews for help, I saw a photo of the contents of the package. If I hadn’t checked on here for similar issues, I would’ve never realized that there was another level in my box- which in my defense is less than 3/4 of an inch tall.** to the manufacturer I suggest you place a warning at the very top of the box about the very bottom of the box. lol**Max mapped my 1000sqft condo then swept it in under an hour, even underneath the bed, over throw rugs, into dark rooms. I was surprised at how smart this vac is. My tile floors are clean. Grout lines too. I’m always tracking in sand, grit and grass.. The noise level is low and doesn’t bother me. Max will be running while I’m at work. I’m very happy with this purchase. He vacuums better than I sweep, picks up hairs, sand, gel caps, dust, grass. Long lasting battery. Only 39% used to map and vac. The app is awesome as well. Money well spent! Merry Christmas To Me!!​
Expected_output: Based on the provided seller description, images, and buyer review of the Roborock Q5 Max+ Robot Vacuum, there is a strong alignment between the seller's promises and the buyer's experience. The seller highlights features such as 5500 Pa HyperForce suction, advanced DuoRoller Brush for effective debris pickup, PreciSense LiDAR Navigation for detailed mapping, self-emptying capabilities with a 2.5L dust bag, and voice/app compatibility. The buyer's review confirms these claims, emphasizing the product's efficiency in navigating a 1000 sq ft condo, its ability to pick up pet hair, sand, and dust, and its ease of setup. The self-emptying dock, which the buyer initially struggled to locate in the packaging, ultimately proved to be highly convenient. The images show a visually appealing and functional product that matches the seller’s promotional materials. While the buyer suggests adding clearer instructions regarding the dock placement in the box, this is not a product fault but rather a packaging improvement. Overall, the buyer expresses satisfaction, validating the product’s reliability and performance. In conclusion, the product meets expectations, and no fault lies with either party. The buyer's slight issue is attributed to packaging clarity, not the product's quality or functionality.
label: 1:Here buyer satisfied with seller
